attributes.action:
Give the UK a Day to remember the dead of COVID-19!
Let’s make the UK Blue.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe it’s needed for the people of the UK! To help the grieving and adjustment!
In my opinion, this is a War against an unknown deadly virus,
Also economically, as in the Great Wars we have all suffered loss!
I have researched the Blue Poppy and in my opinion does not take anything away from The Poppies used for Remembrance in The Great Wars, of which I have the greatest respect!
It is also one of the iconic colours used in Colonial Flags!
attributes.background: A Yearly Remembrance Day, for Victims of COVID-19, with the Blue Poppy as an Emblem. The Blue Poppy advocates the NHS, The Cavell Nurses and the Medical Profession from then on! COVID-19 is a Medical Condition fought on the Frontline by The NHS, All Frontline Service’s, and Communities of the UK!
